TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit X509Certificate2Collection extends System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection

summary.span: 表示 对象集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当打开存储，结果通过表示对象。When an store is opened, the result is represented by an object. 如果您熟悉的非托管的加密 API 构造，则可以将用作内存存储的对象。If you are familiar with the unmanaged Cryptographic API constructs, you can think of an as a memory store of objects. ## Examples 下面的代码示例打开当前用户的个人证书存储区，仅选择有效的证书，允许用户选择一个证书，然后将证书和证书链信息写入到控制台。The following code example opens the current user's personal certificate store, selects only valid certificates, allows the user to select a certificate, and then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console. 输出取决于用户选择的证书。The output depends on the certificate the user selects. [!code-cpp[certselect#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/CPP/certselect.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[certselect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/CS/certselect.cs#1)] [!code-vb[certselect#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/VB/certselect.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建一个空对象，它是与不同的证书或收集信息用于创建对象的其他构造函数。This constructor creates an empty object, which is unlike the other constructors that use certificate or collection information to create the object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例打开当前用户的个人证书存储区，仅选择有效的证书，允许用户选择一个证书，然后将证书和证书链信息写入到控制台。The following code example opens the current user's personal certificate store, selects only valid certificates, allows the user to select a certificate, and then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console. 输出取决于用户选择的证书。The output depends on the certificate the user selects. [!code-cpp[certselect#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/CPP/certselect.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[certselect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/CS/certselect.cs#1)] [!code-vb[certselect#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/VB/certselect.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将添加到集合的对象，并返回该证书的索引位置。This method adds an object to a collection and returns the index location of the certificate. ## Examples 下面的代码示例打开 X.509 证书存储区，将添加和删除证书，然后关闭应用商店。The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store. 它假定您有三个证书，以将添加到和从本地存储区中删除。It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store. [!code-cpp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CPP/x509store2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/x509store2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/x509store2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有一个数组，请使用此方法要添加到对象对象。Use this method if you have an array of objects to add to an object. 和方法处理请求事务处理方式，因此，如果单个添加或删除失败，则中止整个操作。The and methods process requests transactionally, so that if a single add or remove fails, the entire operation is aborted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可以用于 PFX/PKCS12 二进制大型对象 (BLOB) 受密码保护。This method can be used with a PFX/PKCS12 binary large object (BLOB) protected by a password. 可以创建与 PFX/PKCS12 BLOB 中的证书相关联的密钥容器和值可以用来控制此过程。Key containers associated with certificates in the PFX/PKCS12 BLOB can be created and the value can be used to control this process. 请注意，是否不创建的密钥容器，不永久性的私钥。Note that if you do not create a key container, the private key is not persisted. 此方法将证书的字节数组导入证书的集合。This method imports a certificate byte array into a collection of certificates. 此方法支持以下类型：This method supports the following types: - - - - -

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可以用于 PFX/PKCS12 文件或其他需要密码的证书文件。This method can be used with a PFX/PKCS12 file or other certificate files that require a password. 可以创建与 PFX/PKCS12 文件中的证书相关联的密钥容器和值可以用来控制此过程。Key containers associated with certificates in the PFX/PKCS12 file can be created and value can be used to control this process. 请注意，是否不创建的密钥容器，不永久性的私钥。Note that if you do not create a key container, the private key is not persisted. 请注意，PFX/PKCS12 文件可以包含多个证书。Note that a PFX/PKCS12 file can contain more than one certificate. 此方法将与私钥关联的第一个证书导入或如果找到没有私钥，找到的第一个证书。This method imports the first certificate associated with the private key or, if no private key is found, the first certificate found. 此方法支持以下类型：This method supports the following types: - - - - - -

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有一个数组，请使用此方法对象以删除从对象。Use this method if you have an array of objects to remove from an object. 和方法处理请求事务处理方式，因此，如果单个添加或删除失败，则中止整个操作。The and methods process requests transactionally, so that if a single add or remove fails, the entire operation is aborted.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RemoveRange(class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection certificates) cil managed

param.name: certificates
param.span: 一个 对象。

span.span: An object.

summary.span: 从 对象中移除另一个 对象中的多个 对象。

span.span: Removes multiple objects in an object from another object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果证书使用此方法想要从另一个删除的对象对象。Use this method if you have certificates in an object that you want to remove from another object. 和方法处理请求事务处理方式，因此，如果单个添加或删除失败，则中止整个操作。The and methods process requests transactionally, so that if a single add or remove fails, the entire operation is aborted.

span.span: is .
